p: Generally, textiles that come into contact with human skin provide a warm and moist environment for microorganisms. Sweaty fabrics are an ideal environment for bacterial growth and proliferation [ 60, 61]. Hence, functionalizing fabrics with Ag-NPs for antimicrobial properties is an interesting aspect of processing garments and clinical dressings. Additionally, Ag-NPs provide the finished fabrics with water and oil repellent properties [ 62]. Thus, this prevents the Ag-fabric from becoming wet and gathering moisture, thereby preventing microbial growth.
